meanings.definition: The quality or state of being dastardly.
meanings.sent1: His dastardlinesses were evident in his cowardly retreat from the battle.
meanings.sent2: The dastardlinesses of the villain were revealed when he abandoned his comrades.
meanings.sent3: The dastardlinesses of the sneaky fox stealing the hen's eggs were quite obvious.
meanings.sent4: The dastardlinesses of the storm clouds darkened the sky with fear.
meanings.sent5: The dastardlinesses of the haunted house sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.definition: The behavior or actions characteristic of a dastard.
meanings.sent1: She was appalled by the dastardlinesses of his betrayal.
meanings.sent2: The dastardlinesses of the thief were evident in his sneaky tactics.
meanings.sent3: The dastardlinesses of the raccoon stealing the picnic basket were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The dastardlinesses of the wind howled through the night, causing unease.
meanings.sent5: The dastardlinesses of the dragon's fiery breath struck fear into the villagers.
